en_us: Pick up a container with the relocator
Craft Relocators to pick up and move containers such as chests and Custom Crafters.
Relocators can be used to move machine blocks. They can be crafted in a Custom Crafter with end game materials.
Relocators can be crafted with the following recipe:
A silk touch page can be used instead of a book.
Placing an empty relocator on a container will pick up it up, along with all of its contents.\n\nMachines such as custom crafters can also be picked up with no loss of items.
Placing a filled relocator on the ground will empty the relocator and place the block there.\n\nThe empty relocator will be returned.
